summary: Relating to the Criminal Code; repealing Section 12A.08.110 Unauthorized Use of Motor Vehicle; 12A.08.080 Extortion; 12A.06.060 Unlawful Imprisonment; amending Sections 12A.16.060 Unlawful Interference with a Police Dog or Horse; 12A.14.080 Unlawful Use of Weapons; 12A.02.090 Constitutional Rights; and 12A.02.110 Violations - Intentional Failure to Comply.
